name: Philip Saunders
bio: Founder of Nebulis. Former Fellow for Ethereum at Exosphere. Born and raised in Ireland, Philip is a web developer and studied English, Italian and Applied Mathematics at University College Cork.

name: Jérôme de Tychey
bio: French-Luxembourger economist and miner, now focused on promoting ethereum for empowerment and businesses.

name: Harsh Vakharia
bio: Engineer by passion. Creator by heart. Admirer of simplicity. Harsh has completed Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering and is a Software Engineer.
